knimeNode.name: ExcelPasswordManager
knimeNode.shortDescription: Manages password setting on given Excel files

fullDescription.intro:
This node manages password setting on given Excel files
You can add, change or remove passwords from input files.
The node supports three formats chosen by file extension: XLS,XLSX,XLSM
fullDescription.option: Enter a valid location where the Excel is located. The required syntax of a path depends on the chosen file system, such as "C:\path\to\file" (Local File System on Windows) or "/path/to/file" (Local File System on Linux/MacOS and Mountpoint).
Select if the template file should be overwritten or if a new file should be created. Note: If "Create new file" is selected - then you have to specify a output file

Enter a valid location where the output file should be created. This file will be used as template - including the formatting and data. The required syntax of a path depends on the chosen file system, such as "C:\path\to\file" (Local File System on Windows) or "/path/to/file" (Local File System on Linux/MacOS and Mountpoint).
Select if the node should fail - if the new file already exists. Or if the existing file should be overwritten.

Select here what password operation you want to perform. The following password options are available: Add PWD = file has no password, but output should be secured Change PWD = file has an password, but output should have a different password Remove PWD = file has an password, but output should not be secured
